name: East Bay AIDS Center (EBAC)
short_desc: Offers primary HIV medical care, consultation, access to clinical trials, phone advice, and support groups
description: People living with HIV and AIDS can find hands-on support, medical treatments, complementary therapies, and educational services at EBAC. Patients also have access to clinical research trials, expanded access to medications, and additional support services. Program is led by a multidisciplinary team of caring professionals, offering comprehensive services throughout the continuum of HIV disease.
